net.egartley.beyondorigins.objects

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.egartley.beyondorigins.objects.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    A row, or "strip", of individual frames of a specific entity or object
    Author:
    Evan Gartley
    See Also:
    SpriteSheet, Entity

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      short currentFrameIndex 
      java.util.ArrayList<AnimationFrame> frameCollection
      All of the possible frameCollection that the sprite could use, which are derived from strip
      int frameHeight
      The height in pixels for each frame
      int frameWidth
      The width in pixels for each frame
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage strip
      The image that contains all of the sprite's possible frames

    • Constructor Summary

      Sprite(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image, int width, int height) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getCurrentFrameAsBufferedImage()
      Returns the current frame (frameCollection[currentFrameIndex]) as a buffered image
      AnimationFrame getFrameAt(int index)
      Returns the frame at the given index (from frameCollection)
      void setFrames(int numberOfFrames)
      Resets the frame collection and re-loads it with the given number of frameCollection

      • setFrames

        public void setFrames(int numberOfFrames)
        Resets the frame collection and re-loads it with the given number of frameCollection
        Parameters:

        See Also:
